form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION, N-400 ( (Rev. 11-26-79)N

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/30/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form Approved IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE OMB NO. 43-R0079 FEE STAMP 45231 APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION 12-16-80 Mail or take to: 9.00 IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE D ALIEN REGISTRATION Show the exact spelling of your name as it appears on your alien registration (See INSTRUCTIONS. BE SURE YOU UNDERSTAND EACH receipt card, and the number of your card. If you did not register, so state.) QUESTION BEFORE YOU ANSWER IT. PLEASE PRINT OR Name Chan So Laan TYPE.) (Leave Blank) My 1601 No. A-17 190 805 Section of Law Date: 6-30-80 (1) My full true and correct name is Chan, Laan Chan 2 So (Full true name without abbreviations) (2) I now live at 1013 1/2 W. Kensington Road Number and street, ) Los Angeles, Calif 90026 (City county, state, zip code) (3) I was born on 3-17-1915 in Canton Kwangtung china (Month) (Day) (Year) (City or town) ( County, province, or state) (Country) (4) I request that my name be changed to None (5) Other names I have used are: None (Include maiden name) Sex: Male Female (6) Was your father or mother ever a United States citizen? Yes No (If "Yes", explain fully) (7) Can you read and write English? Yes No (8) Can you speak English? Yes No (9) Can you sign your name in English? Yes No (10) My lawful admission for permanent residence was on 5-10-1969 under the name of (Month) (Day) (Year) Chan, So Loan at Los Angeles California (City) (State) (11) Since that date I have resided continuously in the United States and continuously in the State of California where I now live since 5-10-1969 During the last five years I have been physically present in the United States for a total of 60 months. (12) Do you intend to reside permanently in the United States? Yes No If "No," explain: (13) In what places in the United States have you lived during the last 5 years? List present address FIRST. FROM To STREET ADDRESS CITY AND STATE (a) May 1977 PRESENT TIME 1013 1/2 W. Kensington Road Los Angeles, California (b) July 1975 May 1977 1948 Carmen Ave. " , (c) May 1969 July 19.75 1633 Lucile Ave. " (d) 19 19 (14) (a) Have you been out of the United States since your lawful admission as a permanent resident? Yes No If "Yes" fill in the following information for every absence of less than 6 months, no matter how short it was. NAME OF SHIP, OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, BUS DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES (b) Since your lawful admission, have you been out of the United States for a period of 6 months or longer? Yes No If "No", state "None"; If "Yes", fill in following information for every absence of more than 6 months. NAME OF SHIP OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, BUS DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES None Form N-400 (Rev. 11-26-79)N (OVER) (1) LOS JUL 29 1980
